title: Yappa Choroin Desho!
original_name: やっぱチョロインでしょ!
sinopse:
The Chuuni boy, due to special education from Otaku parents, Nonomiya Ippei meets a strange vortex that changes his destiny. Immediately he recognized it was summoning magic and rushed off, forward into the future!

Thus begins the story of the 16 year-old's royal comedy in a fantasy world!
